title: PGIMER Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER)  has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, M.Sc., can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the a...
